title: Keep getting bugsplat
body: i just tried Playing a few games but i keep getting bugsplat or the game just has a black screen, ive just gotten placed into a lower priority que and my loot has been disabled. This is getting really annoying can you please sort this out. (one of these games was in my ranked promos)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, does this resolve your issue?
